alert.note: Alert for Carbon; Emery (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 3:28PM MDT until August 18 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL EMERY AND SOUTH CENTRAL CARBON COUNTIES... At 327 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Sunnyside, or 16 miles southeast of Price, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Sunnyside and East Carbon. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 251 and 268. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
